section.title: Common Use-Cases
Applying Properties to Specific Elements
section.p:
If you need to apply some properties to specific elements, you can use the DITA outputclass attribute:Flowers Flower Type Soil Chrysanthemum perennial well drained Gardenia perennial acidic Gerbera annual sandy, well-drained
In this case, the selector will be based on this outputclass:*[class ~= "topic/table"] *[outputclass ~= "colored"] { background-color: yellow; }
